extends java.lang.Object
    Builder class for AudioFocusController class objects.

    • Method Detail

      • setUsage

        public AudioFocusController.Builder setUsage(int usage)
        Sets the attribute describing what is the intended use of the audio signal.
        Parameters:
        usage - one of AudioAttributes.USAGE_UNKNOWN, AudioAttributes.USAGE_MEDIA, AudioAttributes.USAGE_VOICE_COMMUNICATION, AudioAttributes.USAGE_VOICE_COMMUNICATION_SIGNALLING, AudioAttributes.USAGE_ALARM, AudioAttributes.USAGE_NOTIFICATION, AudioAttributes.USAGE_NOTIFICATION_RINGTONE, AudioAttributes.USAGE_NOTIFICATION_COMMUNICATION_REQUEST, AudioAttributes.USAGE_NOTIFICATION_COMMUNICATION_INSTANT, AudioAttributes.USAGE_NOTIFICATION_COMMUNICATION_DELAYED, AudioAttributes.USAGE_NOTIFICATION_EVENT, AudioAttributes.USAGE_ASSISTANT, AudioAttributes.USAGE_ASSISTANCE_ACCESSIBILITY, AudioAttributes.USAGE_ASSISTANCE_NAVIGATION_GUIDANCE, AudioAttributes.USAGE_ASSISTANCE_SONIFICATION, AudioAttributes.USAGE_GAME.
        Returns:
        The same Builder instance.

      • setContentType

        public AudioFocusController.Builder setContentType(int contentType)
        Sets the attribute describing the content type of the audio signal, such as speech, or music.
        Parameters:
        contentType - the content type values, one of AudioAttributes.CONTENT_TYPE_MOVIE, AudioAttributes.CONTENT_TYPE_MUSIC, AudioAttributes.CONTENT_TYPE_SONIFICATION, AudioAttributes.CONTENT_TYPE_SPEECH, AudioAttributes.CONTENT_TYPE_UNKNOWN.
        Returns:
        the same Builder instance.

      • setAcceptsDelayedFocus

        public AudioFocusController.Builder setAcceptsDelayedFocus(boolean acceptsDelayedFocus)
        Sets whether the app will accept delayed focus gain. Default is true.
        Parameters:
        acceptsDelayedFocus - Whether the app accepts delayed focus gain.
        Returns:
        The same Builder instance.

      • setPauseWhenDucked

        public AudioFocusController.Builder setPauseWhenDucked(boolean pauseWhenDucked)
        Sets whether the audio will be paused instead of ducking when AudioManager.AUDIOFOCUS_LOSS_TRANSIENT_CAN_DUCK is received. Default is false.
        Parameters:
        pauseWhenDucked - Whether the audio will be paused instead of ducking.
        Returns:
        The same Builder instance.

      • setAudioFocusChangeListener

        public AudioFocusController.Builder setAudioFocusChangeListener(@NonNull
                                                                AudioFocusController.OnAudioFocusChangeListener listener)
        Sets the AudioFocusController.OnAudioFocusChangeListener that will receive callbacks.
        Parameters:
        listener - The AudioFocusController.OnAudioFocusChangeListener implementation that will receive callbacks.
        Returns:
        The same Builder instance.

      • setStream

        public AudioFocusController.Builder setStream(int stream)
        Sets the audio stream for devices lower than Android Oreo.
        Parameters:
        stream - The stream that will be used for playing the audio. Should be one of AudioManager.STREAM_ACCESSIBILITY, AudioManager.STREAM_ALARM, AudioManager.STREAM_DTMF, AudioManager.STREAM_MUSIC, AudioManager.STREAM_NOTIFICATION, AudioManager.STREAM_RING, AudioManager.STREAM_SYSTEM or AudioManager.STREAM_VOICE_CALL.
        Returns:
        The same Builder instance.

      • setDurationHint

        public AudioFocusController.Builder setDurationHint(int durationHint)
        Sets the duration for which the audio will be played.
        Parameters:
        durationHint - The duration hint, one of AudioManager.AUDIOFOCUS_GAIN, AudioManager.AUDIOFOCUS_GAIN_TRANSIENT, AudioManager.AUDIOFOCUS_GAIN_TRANSIENT_EXCLUSIVE or AudioManager.AUDIOFOCUS_GAIN_TRANSIENT_MAY_DUCK.
        Returns:
        The same Builder instance.

      • setPauseWhenAudioIsNoisy

        public AudioFocusController.Builder setPauseWhenAudioIsNoisy(boolean value)
        Sets whether playback will be paused when audio becomes noisy. Default is false.

        If this function is passed true, a context-registered broadcast receiver is registered for AudioManager.ACTION_AUDIO_BECOMING_NOISY. When this broadcast is received, AudioFocusController.OnAudioFocusChangeListener.pause() will be called, and focus will be abandoned.

        Parameters:
        value - Whether playback will be paused when audio becomes noisy.
        Returns:
        The same Builder instance.

      • build

        @NonNull
public AudioFocusController build()
        Builds a new AudioFocusController instance combining all the information gathered by this Builder's configuration methods.

        Throws IllegalStateException when the listener has not been set.

        Returns:
        the AudioFocusController instance qualified by all the properties set on this Builder.
